Name: Launch preparation & go‑live checklist
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Compile and execute pre‑launch QA: verify redirects, analytics tracking, forms/bookings, mobile responsiveness, and speed tests (e.g., Lighthouse score >90). Deploy to production; monitor for downtime. Definition: Site live with no critical errors; all Objective D optimizations confirmed.

Name: Post‑launch validation & bug sweep
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Scan logs for errors, test key user flows (e.g., booking, form submissions), and confirm integrations (HubSpot sync, email deliverability). Fix any immediate issues. Definition: Zero P0 bugs; validation report documented.

Name: Set up monitoring dashboards & alerts
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Configure real-time alerts for downtime, performance drops (e.g., Core Web Vitals), error spikes, and traffic anomalies. Integrate with Slack/Email for notifications. Definition: Dashboards live; test alerts triggered successfully.

Name: Schedule software updates & backups
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Automate dependency scans/updates; set weekly backups (database, media via Cloudinary/S3). Include rollback procedures. Definition: Cron jobs or actions configured; first manual update/backup tested.

Name: Content audit & refresh plan
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Review all pages for outdated info; create a quarterly calendar for blog posts, testimonials, and location updates. Seed initial post‑launch content (e.g., launch announcement blog). Definition: Audit report; calendar shared with team.

Name: Ongoing SEO monitoring
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Tools: Google Search Console, GA4, Ahrefs/Semrush (if subscribed)
Description: Set up weekly checks for rankings, crawl errors, and backlinks. Adjust schema/metadata as needed. Definition: Baseline post‑launch report; alerts for drops in traffic/visibility.

Name: User feedback & A/B iteration setup
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Embed feedback tools (e.g., polls on key pages); review A/B tests from Objective C and plan first iterations (e.g., headline variants). Definition: Feedback form live; initial test deployed.

Name: Security audit & compliance check
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Run vulnerability scans; verify GDPR/cookie consent; renew SSL if needed. Address any post‑launch exposures. Definition: Audit passed with no high‑severity issues; report filed.

Name: Lead pipeline review & optimizations
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Analyze first‑week conversions, lead quality, and drop-offs. Tweak forms/bookings based on data (e.g., simplify fields). Definition: Optimization plan documented; initial changes implemented.

Name: Define support contract & handover
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Outline post‑launch support (e.g., 1 month included, then retainer); create handover docs/video for ongoing maintenance. Definition: Contract addendum signed; docs shared.

Name: Quarterly performance review process
Phase: Phase 5 — Launch & Post‑Launch (WBS P5.xx)
Description: Establish a recurring review: metrics on traffic, conversions, uptime; plan enhancements (e.g., new features). Definition: First review scheduled; template ready (recurring, ~4 hours/quarter not in initial total).
